text: Ara kitabidera madhye emana loka rayeche, ye bipula sampada amanata rakhale'o pherata debe [1]; abara emana loka'o ache yara kache ekati dinara amanata rakhale'o tara upara sarbocca tagada na dile se ta pherata debe na. Eta e karane ye, tara bale, ‘um'midera byapare amadera upara kono badhyabadhakata ne'i’ [2] ara tara jene-bujhe allah‌ra upara mithya bale
